title: York Minster Residency
description: Amici Coro had the privilege of singing at York Minster for a weekend in June 2024. The choir performed Evensong on Saturday and Sunday, as well as the Sunday Eucharist.

Saturday Evensong: Introit: O Lord, Give Thy Holy Spirit - Tallis
Sunday Evensong: Introit: If Ye Love Me - Tallis
